body.p: Kentucky attorney and soldier. Attended school with Mr. Sayre in Frankfort, Kentucky. Graduated from Yale College in 1856. Studied law with Thomas N. Lindsey. Admitted to the bar in 1858. Practiced law in St. Louis, Missouri and Frankfort, Kentucky. Married to Mary O. Preston Brown. Father of at least four children. Served as a major of the 10th Kentucky Cavalry from October 1862 to April 1863. Served as assistant inspector general with the rank of colonel of Kentucky from November 1863 to February 1864. Served as colonel of the 45th Kentucky Mounted Infantry from February 1864 to December 1864. Resumed practice of law in 1865 at Frankfort, Kentucky.
